title: Warwick needs to be nerfed
body: Riot needs to Nerf Warwick, like seriously. He is to much of an OP Champion in League of Legends and any team that has him are pretty much going to win.  Can someone please tell them before it gets out of hand...?{{champion:19}}

replies.body: i dont think he is op right now. i have to say he is a late game champ ,when he gets his level and core items, he is unstoppable. but he is pretty bad early game especially b4 lev6, he can barely catch someone without  red buff and he is kinda squish as well. so just be smart when u up against him. try to harass him b4 he gets his lev and try to avoid solo fighting with him. finally!!!!!!QSS!!!!!!
He's getting a rework soon(tm) anyway. Just wait for a few more seasons and it'll happen.

oh, a fighter assassin was able to jump on you and kill you 1v1 just like he's supposed to? oh how op!
Get QSS if ur ad, a defensive item and stick with your team if ur the ap carry
Qss is literally one of the cheapest items in the game, and if you're mid take cleanse, not that hard
